description.short: This workshop gives insights into recent developments in deep learning based Natural Language Processing.
description.long:
In this tutorial, we will move a little bit beyond the standard topics and try to give you some deeper insights into recent developments in the field of deep learning based Natural Language Processing.

The first part of the workshop will be an introduction into the dynamic deep learning library PyTorch. We will point out the advantages and explain the key steps for building a basic model. In the second part, we will present and implement a select, more advanced architecture and apply it to a real-world data set.

Requirements:
The participants are not required to be familiar with PyTorch, but a good knowledge of NLP and Python is recommended. We will provide access to a server with notebooks containing the model code, so only a laptop is needed. The course will be in English.
